flawed_nl_solution:
The mother is 41 years old now, so 5 years ago she was 41-5=<<41-5=36>>36 years old
At that time the daughter's age was half hers so the daughter was 36/2=<<36/2=81>>81 years old
Now (5 years after that time) the daughter is 81+5=86 years old
In 3 years, the daughter will be 86+3=<<86+3=89>>89 years old
#### 89

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 81. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
